name: Rescue Caris
description:
Description

The protagonist is Aliena, daughter of a fisherman named Klaus Fish.

Her sister Caris has been detained in the castle by order of King Edward I as a result of a non-payment of taxes by Klaus Fish. 

Aliena goes out one night when the king and most of his guard are not in the castle ready to infiltrate the castle and rescue her sister Caris.

On the mission to rescue Caris, Aliena will encounter two characters: the physician and wise man George and the guard guarding the throne room door, William.

She will have to use her cunning and ingenuity to overcome the obstacles that separate her from her sister and rescue her.

Controls
  • ESC - Pause
  • TAB - Inventory
  • Within the inventory you can combine objects by clicking on two objects
  • To exit the first-person camera, right click
  • To skip dialogs, press the space key.
